description: Pell numbers A000129(n+1) (without P(0)) convoluted twice with itself.
comments: a(n)= A054456(n+2,2) (third column of Pell convolution triangle).
formula: a(n)= ((10*n^2+39*n+32)*P(n+1)+(n+1)*(4*n+11)*P(n))/32, P(n)=A000129(n).G.f.: 1/(1-2*x-x^2)^3.a(n)=F''(n+3, 2)/2, that is, 1/2 times the 2nd derivative of the (n+3)th Fibonacci polynomial evaluated at x=2. - _T. D. Noe_, Jan 19 2006
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 27 2000
